title: DAI Strategy Switch
body:
👩🏻‍🌾 Calling all farmers, should we switch the existing DAI strategy to the updated smart contracts, which will update it to 2.5x yield boost from ops treasury and 30% profit sharing?

🍑 The downside to this, is that the DAI in the pool will experience slippage from Swerve, but thereafter receive the 2.5x higher rewards.
Vote 🍉 to switch. Vote 🚫 to not switch.

🚜 Poll ends in 12 hours 4 minutes. For this poll, we will run it both here and in snapshot, and use both of the results to understand differences in voting styles on each platform.
author: 0x252E7E8B9863f81798B1fEF8CfD9741A46De653C
